Did this occur on a new workspace? 
If using a previous workspace... did you do a -clean for the eclipse startup (or
just delete the eclipse\configuration directory? Sometimes this can cause
problems from previous drivers.

If all this still fails, can you provide the code or an example that causes this
problem (as an attachment)? Thanks...

This happens with a new Workspace. I'll try to find an example - using existing
code is not an option since our project is too big and dependency hell ;-)).
Closing since we have no new info on this.
